website_summaries.verdict: You'll get accurate results from this sleek, feature-packed blood pressure monitor from a leading brand.
pros: Sports a trim, compact design with no wires or tubes
Has Bluetooth and is compatible with Apple Health for tracking your readings virtually
Accurate and works straight away with the touch of a button
cons: Initial setup is fiddly, especially for users who aren't tech-savvy
Occasional connectivity and app bugs noted

customer_reviews.title: I found the Solution
customer_reviews.text: The same problem. No reliable connection, if not at all, with iPhone (7). It is obvious that it's not only me. So. Please fix the software to transfer the data. BW Update!!! DO NOT trust the batteries. Replace the batteries that come with theEVOLV immediately. I had a serious con problem, see above. When I replaced the batteries with Eneloop 930mAh there was NO con problem AT ALL. So, its NOT the software. BW 24/4/18
customer_reviews.author: Difficult Client

customer_reviews.title: If you are seeing E5 errors read this.
customer_reviews.text: Overall really pleased with this product. Makes taking regular measurements a breeze. If you experience E5 Errors (Clothing interfering with measurement) you may have the cuff fastened too tightly. Initially I got lots of these errors but fitting the cuff more loosely cured the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert Booth

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: After my old m6 started giving me errors after 15yrs reliable service I bought this and promptly sent it back! Very overpriced, gimmick and is very inaccurate, readings fluctuate wildly taken one after the other. Readings are generally 10-20 points LESS than it actually is For the price it has less features than some of their other more traditional designed models. I didn't have any problems pairing it or transferring readings at all. I bought an x4 smart instead and it's very consistent and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tanzanite

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use, this item is satisfying all expectations. I have checked the accuracy at my local GP surgery. It is easier to use than those with rubber tubing. The software interface is adequate but with just basic functions. It would be nice to have results colour coded and have more display options. Although the manual says it is designed for single person use - it is possible to have several users. You have to take care that the device is only connected to one person's app at any one time. Once the results are synchronised to one app, it is not possible to send the results again to another person's app.
customer_reviews.author: Full system recovery possible

customer_reviews.title: Will not give a reading if experiencing ectopic heart beats.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it except for one issue. It will not display a reading whilst the user is experiencing ectopic heart beats, and returns a error. Contacted Omron, there first response was to tell me to use it over a shirt or jumper sleeve, but it didn’t help and still returned a error. Second response from Omron was that it would return an error whilst if the user was experiencing ectopic or irregular heart beats. So I revert back to my Qardio BPM when I am experiencing ectopics, which is a shame as otherwise the Omron is very convenient and easy to use. The Qardio does give a reading whilst experiencing ectopics! !!!PLEASE SORT THIS OMRON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Please be careful - very inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this machine. It was very inaccurate. It was giving me readings of around 130/80 regularly. Today I had to have an ambulance out. They took 10 readings over the hour they were here and apart from the first couple I was very calm. My bp on the ambulance monitor was consistently around 169/110. I even tested this monitor against they’re one as soon as they took their monitor off and the readings were still just as much out. Please be careful as this clearly gives false normal readings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for ONE user at a time
customer_reviews.text: Superb piece of kit easy to use; extremely compact and nice not to be unwinding the pipe every time. Surprisingly compact and fits neatly in supplied case. Works flawlessly and very easy to read with a real quality feel. Setup is simple and Omron app stores the data. I would like to be able to export / print the data for G.P. Warning: Only really suitable for ONE user as data mixed together otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Strobes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use  - Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I like this device, it’s very convenient and gives an instant display of BP, Pulse and AF. If it’s not fitted correctly it will tell you. I have an iphone iphone 11 and have had no trouble connecting to the omron app. I can print off a list from that of my results. Cannot comment on accuracy but it seems consistent and matches the doctors surgery device - although I believe this device is much better. There is a case Or more like a zip bag provided with the device. I’m finding I’m taking by BP much more often than I probably need to as it’s so easy to use 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Dcjack

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses the regular BP monitor with an airline trailing to the main pump; it's faffy and it's noisy. This monitor is an all-in-one unit, no training airlines and it's very simple to set up and use. The curled armband fits perfectly with adjustable velcro to get just the right fit. You press one button and off it goes. It's syncs to my iPhone perfectly and my readings and history are stored so I can see my trends and show my Doctor if ever I need to. It's small and compact and the best BP monitor I've ever seen or used.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: impractical and defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought it over a year ago and it worked right away. it was intended for an elderly person with a very large arm. the result of the measurements was always different and consumed the 4 batteries in no time. we were unable to read the measurement history because the user was not in possession of a smartphone. it was a bad experience. I wanted to return it immediately but I didn't find the instruction manuals in the various languages ​​to complete the package. he never used it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a few hours and already seriously impressed. Using it with the app will help enormously with monitoring my health. There is also the advantage of using the journal to monitor trends from the readings. This is a subscription service but I reckon it's totally worthwhile. Setting it up and linking it with the app was very straightforward and I was impressed by the very clear and concise instructions which were given by the app. All in all I must say that I would recommend this product without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: DCG

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't inflate as quickly as the conventional model with a pipe from the pump to the armband, which leads me to believe it ought to be more accurate. It is quiet (contrary to some reviews) - much quieter than the model with pipe. The link to your (i)phone works superbly and from there you can email yourself the historical measurements. It is very compact. I'm scoring 5 for accuracy because I believe it should be accurate - I don't know - but it would be unfair to mark it down because I don't know. Overall I can't fault it - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I found that the cuff over inflates and became quite painful... The readings were very inaccurate. I had a reading of 138/101 and when checked by the doctor it was actually 113/72. Okay there will be differences in measurements but not by that much... Don't waste your money on this machine.
customer_reviews.author: MR MICHAEL SUATOR

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and consistent readings.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this. Lots of negative comments about connectivity but this worked like a dream to my Galaxy S8. Consistent readings ever since - my previous Braun wrist monitor was never this good. The 'no squeeze' feel is really good - of course you can feel it but strangely this is nowhere near as bad as the traditional pumps and much much quicker. Another thing rarely mentioned is the cuff size. I always need the large cuff as most devices come with a medium cuff. This fits like a dream and will clearly fit all sizes as described. Would I recommend? Without doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good investment
customer_reviews.text: Having just had recent cardiac episode, I decided to invest in a BPM so I could track any irregular patterns of heart beat and monitor my blood pressure, when linked to the Omron app the measurements go directly into my iPhone and form a easy to read graph. No cables, no tubes, no wires really easy to use, gives me some much needed reassurance and piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: robin moss

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice and easy product, apart from the connection between the blood pressure device and your mobile device. You end up having to write down your results. Not easy to connect with other apps eg googlefit. This product has not been properly tested with users before being released. Don't buy this product they made sure they created a product that works properly. But a cheaper version and just write down your results. As you don't get any support from customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony-George

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Can pitch occasionally but rotating the cuff after putting it on sorts that out. Some issues with Bluetooth connection requiring the odd reboot of my phone but no stress as it remembers the time/date of a lot of readings. The app has improved massively and makes it very easy to share the readings with your doctor/nurse including averages over time. Battery life is a few months of use when taking two readings daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and neat in design. One piece unit means no tubes to battle with. Very accurate, especially when compared with the Braun models. Links to the app on the iPhone, stores the information, and links to Apple Health. The only way it could be better if it could be set up for at least two users. If anyone else uses it, you need to open the app and delete the data. Not a big problem, but slightly annoying. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rfuk

customer_reviews.title: Working properly, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife, but before that tested. Working properly, easy to operate. In some cases this can be important, considering that some people using it >might not be fully adequate.Compared with other brands I have (wrist and upper Arm blood pressure meters ) this one is giving about the same results. I can recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: IAGoteborg

customer_reviews.title: Good machine made in Japan, good guarantee
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, cannot comment on accuracy at the moment. Instructions a little confusing but once mastered seems a well designed product. A little annoyed that Amazon advertised a case for it, implied that it needed one, very annoyed to find the machine comes with one. Must go to the post office to return it, blood inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: k fowles Italy

customer_reviews.title: Works well with app
customer_reviews.text: My MT 10 had become irratic so was looking to replace.Liked the idea of synching to my phone. Despite some poor reviews I have found the process easy.I Downloaded the app..strap on the monitor.It is much faster than the old one and yes the reading transfer onto the app immediately. The app records morning and nights and also has other features that you can tag..ie if you take tablets,excercise sleep alcohol. I'm extremely happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: gizzmo

customer_reviews.title: Great customer experience
customer_reviews.text: My medical history means I must use twice per day so reliability is everything. This is device number 4 and one for which cost was number 2 criteria. Works better than rest as it takes a reading most times, previous more expensive Apple partner one did not and nearly got thrown out of the window with frustration. Auto transfer to Apple Health Kit was also critical. Sometimes I need to be more patient but generally delighted..
customer_reviews.author: Nic C.

customer_reviews.title: Top rated BP monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This is highly accurate (which review) and produces an excellent report on your smartphone you can email to your GP. The data will automatically transfer to your smartphone but you have to enable location access for the Omron app for some reason. The app will also flag up irregular heartbeat and/or atrial fibrillation, which is very useful information for your GP. N.B.! Some reviews say that it won't transfer data. Once you have opened the app and taken a reading it does take a few seconds for the reading to appear on the phone. You don't have to press the 'transfer data' button unless you are transferring data to the phone later.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use machine from a well respected market leader
customer_reviews.text: I am a GP and I wanted to be a bit more proactive in monitoring my blood pressure (BP). With a regular device the trickiest part of taking a reading is fitting the cuff on to yourself. There is no such problem with this device. It really is simple to fit and take a reading. Using the Omron app, it is simple to upload these pulse and BP readings on to your phone, so you can track and show your GP or practice nurse. I can't comment on the accuracy except to say that Omron is well respected for its BP machines. I highly recommend this. You really will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to use, easy to pair with your phone, and then put the results in a spreadsheet to trend the readings over a day and more. It's well built and interestingly the brand was recommended by my doctor. I use it regularly each day and trend the results. It gives one peace of mind and the ability to act if things start to move upward.
customer_reviews.author: Dr P S Luke

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I need to say that this product is quite poor and support from Omron is even worse. Constant connectivity issues with my android phone and even worse that the readings were very inaccurate. Strange it says that this monitor is clinically proven not sure how as I had two of them and both were increasing the reading. Which makes this monitor quite pricey piece of hardware! Check this twice with my GP and each time readings were off by 20.
customer_reviews.author: Patryk Wypych

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of equipment!!!
customer_reviews.text: The fact it requires no wires makes it so much easier to use. You don’t get that tight squeezing sensation on the arm which you get with other models and so its much nicer to use. Love the design, it’s very slick. I also love the way the data is graphed on your phone and how easy it is to export the data to send to your doctors. So glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but I wish it could also do 24h monitoring
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to wear and use, easy to read and the app (on iOS) works well. I wish the app would have been able to control the monitor (start-stop then read) and allow for a 24h monitoring if this thing is still bluetooth enabled. Alas, it is not the case so it is good for manual BP monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Sandu Mihai

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bit Of Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great BP Machine gives accurate results not had any problems at all synchronising readings with the app uploads to the cloud effortlessly and stores all your readings very pleased. Im so glad I got this model as it gives you the freedom of not having the tubes from cuff to machine, After reading so many negative reviews I was weary but decided to give it a go so glad I did fantastic decision
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want to keep your data
customer_reviews.text: Firstly , it is accurate BUT if you want to keep your results forget it. The unit will not synch regularly with any phone I have and you have to reconnect all the time of 10 days results I was left with 2 - great concept but no ready for the market
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Mackechnie

customer_reviews.title: Good and easy
customer_reviews.text: It's good, easy to use and, despite the experiences of some others that I read, not too difficult to set up for two users, you just have to mess about ensuring only one user at a time has their phone/iPad Bluetooth switched on. Be aware though, it will read a pulse up to a maximum of 180, above that it displays an error. So if you suffer attacks of tachycardia and hope to use this device to capture them to show your doctor you may get unsatisfactory results. Other than that, it seems good and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: TJ 106

customer_reviews.title: What pay this price?
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting high end features for this expensive device. On the contrary: it works with AAA batteries, doesn't sync automatically with the phone, doesn't hold measures until you sync with the phone. That's just unacceptable for the price. I have another £30 wrist model which does more with the same accuracy. Refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the second omron I have used, First time I used it ,it showed i had an irregular heartbeat , I have since had several tests ,my heart is in good order ,but I would never had known had I not used this monitor So I am well impressed with the monitor
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. P

customer_reviews.title: A great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Im glad i forked out the extra money; it is so portable and comfortable. Its accuracy is fine as far as I can see having tested it against another Moron product. The detailed analysis was very helpful for my GP tracking the high blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Gawain

customer_reviews.title: Better to have one than not.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 6 months and am very happy with it. It would be better if you could easily track a second or third person but with a bit of effort it can be done. On the whole everything goes into the app and my history is readily available to me. I have recently purchased a second one which I have given to my father as a present so I must think they are worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: OMRON EVOLV
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few blood pressure monitors, this is the best one I have owned. Easy to use and read, saves all the data and can be transferred to your phone. Great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kenneth Milne

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped, expensive, un-user-friendly gadgetry
customer_reviews.text: The instructions come in many languages, but might as well all be in Chinese. The battery compartment is very fiddly and difficult for anybody elderly or without acute eyesight, and the app is very unhelpful about the basics of how to use it and fails in my experience to show the clear, coloured easily legible screen of readings that the manufacturers advertise and that was a key reason why I was foolish enough to waste my money on this piece of overhyped gadgetry.
customer_reviews.author: E.A. Watts Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed, precise and accurate when compared with doctors surgery. Software not so good, its only a one person user as far as I can understand - thought it was a multi purson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it for the peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Well made, the android app works a treat and the cuff works as it should. Readings match those of the doctor on the two occasions we've checked. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Paully

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for personal use, easy to use, fabulous score under Which Magazine, can see why. Synced with Smartphone using app. Only thing that would improve this is if you could have 2 users whilst syncing with the app but that isn't a feature that's available. Really good purchase I'd you need to monitor your blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 7 months. Use it to send results to consultant. No problems working with Samsung galaxy S10 transfers reading very quickly. Detects atrial fibrillation. Checked against chemist and surgery machines is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Very accurate. Easy to connect with iPhone using app. It won’t show up in the Apple Health app unless you provide permission.
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Supplied with dead alkaline batteries -DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: My hospital cardiologist suggested I purchase this unit for a weeks worth of results before our consultation next week. Device arrived, instructions state only use alkaline batteries, inserted batteries supplied - dead. No choice but to return the device meaning I won't have the required period of results - disgrace. Buy from this supplier at your own peril, you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Great design, Bluetooth configuration a bit fiddly but works perfectly with the app. Easy to use by one person for daily checks. Quality comes with a price but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Kucharski

customer_reviews.title: Great with no cables in the way.
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product. Seems accurate and us very easy to use once you install the app on your phone and turn Bluetooth on. Keeping a good history of my readings. Has a nice case to put in when not in use too
customer_reviews.author: Boon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: No problems setting it up and using. Feels robust and well made. Couldn’t comment on accuracy as not medically trained but omron come out best on which magazine who do testing and should be a reliable reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have only good things to say about this product. It is certainly easy to use and feels very comfortable on the arm. Readings are clear and the quality seems just fine. I have only had it a few days but I am confident that I will be happy with this purchase for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: High quality clinically validated blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Clinically validated, easy to use. Need to follow the instructions on how to place the device on upper arm. Easy bluetooth connection with iphone. Made in Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently easy to use BP monitor
customer_reviews.text: Does what the ad promises.Great value BP monitor that allows recording and comparing days to trace patterns of raised BP. Easy to use app.
customer_reviews.author: E de Mello

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to handle for my mother. 4 stars only because it is only for one user and can not separate the data.
customer_reviews.author: M.Linhart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blood pressure monitor. Great to keep track of my health. It is possible to export the data in a spreadsheet format to share with my doctor. A lot better than my (horrible and unreadable) handwriting!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate not consistent readings
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate readings. The unit is very nice and easy to use links seamlessly to the Omron App but heho the readings are not consistent. Save money and buy the Omron M7 intelli.
customer_reviews.author: Denis M.

customer_reviews.title: Good accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Can be difficult to gauge the right tension but works well
customer_reviews.author: Mr Paul Slough

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Although this is very easy to use my Dr tells me that it is , according to his own readings , far from accurate . You can't mess around with blood pressure .
customer_reviews.author: Jan kent

customer_reviews.title: Smart Digital readout
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and has smart facilities reading stays visible long enough to record manually tidy looking
customer_reviews.author: X CALIBRE

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on the accuracy of the readings but unlike the one I bought in the states, the one with the white bit above the display panel, this one connects to your device.
customer_reviews.author: Breyeda Kwame

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, took a while to work out storing two peoples recordings but did manage. Clear read out and self fastening makes life much easier than flappy bits of Velcro Compared readings to clinic machines and matched.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blood pressure unit and links to app on phone too !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Readings up to 20 mmHg different from my old Omron MX2 basic, which generally matches readings in GP surgeries.
customer_reviews.author: ItsNotMe

customer_reviews.title: Great BP machine
customer_reviews.text: Reliable. Quick. Connects to phone but assumes all readings are for the same person
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Walker

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for a month's refund !!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to pair with all the phones it has failed. So I turned. I have been waiting for a month for a refund !!!!! I don't recommend this nightmare
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: Liked it !
customer_reviews.text: Very good product very light, quite silent, very quick in measuring..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Ertas

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. It's very comfortable and easy to use. APP Omron Connect is correct, not very intuitive but good enough. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Sanabara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: very convenient in its carry case. Easy to read. downside: unable to store more than one set of values on phone - unable to see the trend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive compared to some monitors but it does everything described. Super easy to use and transfering results to my android phone is very simple.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, no pipes. Links to phone really well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, accurate & easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest BP Monitor but fantastic in use so really pleased. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mosedale

customer_reviews.title: Press button and it’s dose the rest
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product really easy to use and with the app for smart phone u can keep track of ur reading Got my mum on of theses aswell and she to finds it easy to use
customer_reviews.author: MR K W BURKE

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy and accurate but gives an odd error if not worn according to its liking
customer_reviews.author: vitul

customer_reviews.title: accurate and easy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, fits great, no hassell. Blood pressure reading matched that of my GPs measurement.
customer_reviews.author: AdrianLee

customer_reviews.title: Reliable one
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a week or so I can say that I’m happy with the product! Precision is what I was after and I got it. What could be improved is communication with the app as you have to manually sync measurement results sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Savic

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and very compact
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and very compact, seems to be accurate as well. The telephone app needs some work and multi user support would be a big plus if added. Now it assumes 1 x user so any measurments taken from a second user get mixed in during the app udate and need to be them deleted. But I would still recommed the Evolv.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Beckson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. The App is a little bit buggy, but this does not influence the performance of the product.
customer_reviews.author: gugi

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: High quality with good connectivity on Android and iOS devices.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, value and service. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. High quality, works so well with iPhone apps.
customer_reviews.author: TimDug

customer_reviews.title: The product did to pair to my iPhone or neither ...
customer_reviews.text: The product did to pair to my iPhone or neither of my colleagues iPhones. Tried hundred of times with the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, accurate, easy to use. 21st Century rather than the rubbish ones with a tube issued by Doctors.
customer_reviews.author: Glyn Parry

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Did my research and this device definately cuts the mustard, easy to set up and understand. Comfort is 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Super easy to use and download the results. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and sync to my phone, however it should improve the analytics dashboard and the recommendation based on the index everyday
customer_reviews.author: OneP Studio

customer_reviews.title: The simple and accurate way to check your BP regularly. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Why didn't I think of this. Convenience and dependable Omron accuracy in a simple and easy-to-use package why look elsewhere?
customer_reviews.author: Charles Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Bluetooth feature need some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Nice looks and innovative design only let down by the sometimes unreliable bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Fuad J.

customer_reviews.title: I don't regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Near and compact device. App connects very well and syncs quickly. Seems to be accurate enough.
customer_reviews.author: Baje

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine to have!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! So easy to use and accurate. The mobile app is also reliable and very useful!
customer_reviews.author: ShahramK

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with unit.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Worth the price. Bit awkward to read when on R arm. Software good. Calibrated it against GP’s. Exactly the same reading.
customer_reviews.author: TonyR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied from my new device. Easy to use and the app follow up and provide a precise calendar and follow up of pressure measurements
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Asselin de Beauville

customer_reviews.title: I can see a curve of my measured values in my smart phone. Easy to take this with me if ...
customer_reviews.text: This product rocks, I can see a curve of my measured values in my smart phone. Easy to take this with me if I feel I need to.
customer_reviews.author: jazzrocker

customer_reviews.title: Works well for myself, accurate and the app is great.
customer_reviews.text: There could be a auto-sync for the app, as soon as the measurement is done. Only tech-savvy people can properly setup and use the app.
customer_reviews.author: Mikko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. The wireless capability is a huge help in storing results
customer_reviews.author: Mr G A Walters/Mrs V E Walters

customer_reviews.title: How to tell if this is accurate....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but readings do not seem to tally with 24 hour monitor or my own doctor’s machine. So, hard to decide how useful this is.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and the app is amazing, but unfortunately wasn't a good fit for my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Anmar N.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Hard to read the icons when it's on your arm but otherwise all good
customer_reviews.author: Mike Turner

customer_reviews.title: Change your life
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding purchase and has influenced my health and life style
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Aitken

customer_reviews.title: use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: excellent, simple to use, easy enough to carry in bag.
customer_reviews.author: J Ashraf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! High quality, great size, works perfectly. Highly satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarolta

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Blood Pressure unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and pair with mobile phone after downloading the Omron app. So easy to understand readings.
customer_reviews.author: pgf1949

customer_reviews.title: nice and compact unit and storage
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be accurate, nice and compact unit and storage case
customer_reviews.author: Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Very good as an app can be downloaded so you keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good as an app can be downloaded so you keep all your readings on that - found it most useful at the docs. He was impressed too !!
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Not for more than 1 person, designed as a personal device.
customer_reviews.text: The device is lovely. I read lots of reviews, some of which said you could have 2 users log data. So I opted for this over the m7 IT which was half the price of this, this being new technology. You can only have one user, it is possible to faff with 2 phones, 2 apps and keep registering the device to a different phone but this is not convenient. I am disappointed that the comment in the instructions that says 'this is intended to be a personal device' is not in the marketing literature, as I would have bought the cheaper one that has the ability. Hence the 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: redsurfbus
